text: Steve Wright ( - January 16, 2017) was an American bass guitarist. He played with The Greg Kihn Band. He was from El Cerrito, California. Wright died from a heart attack on January 16, 2017 in Sacramento, California. ==References== Category:1950s births Category:2017 deaths Category:American bass guitarists Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction Category:Musicians from California
title: Steve Wright (bassist)
